name: #04 Dead Mall Mystery
description:
(Created for the 2021 Cryptex Jam)

It's your first day working as a security guard at the Dead Mall. Take a look around and get to know the denizens of the Dead Mall food court. Surely nothing weird will happen.

Written by Sarah Willson
Graphics by Errol Elumir
An illustrated 8-bit adventure game made with Adventuron.
